ygData.subject: Re: Weapon question
ygData.msgSnippet: Xanthar, Im not sure where you are but it sounds like you are in QH. Try and find someone that is selling a velium long sword or other magical wep similar to
ygData.messageBody:
Xanthar, Im not sure where you are but it sounds
like you are in QH. Try and find someone that is
selling a velium long sword or other magical wep similar
to this. /auction WTB 1hs magical not alot of pp
please help or something like this might get a response
from a friendly higher lvl. Don't beg but try to buy
from a player. If you can try to go to East Commons
outside of Freeport. They sell everything and anything
there and you can usually get a pretty good
deal.<br><br>Keban Arrowsmith <Royal Fletchers><br>Ranger of
the 21st season<br>Master Fletcher<br>Pretty Good
Brewer
